data.persona: I am a Hosley brother. I talk among the peasants. I confide in others.
data.description:
You are in the Market Center.
Located in the middle of the famous Tempior Market of the Kingdom. Wooden tables line the floor and a bar serves several customers. The finest wines across the Kingdom are lined across the shelves behind the bar and a barb sings songs. The atmosphere is one of joy and camaraderie.
There's a Tavern, a bar, a Market, a Wine, a shelf, a Bar stool, and a Tempior Market here.
The knight and the prior are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to find a place to sit in the tavern
data.mid_motivation: I want to mingle with the other people in the tavern and get to know them
data.long_motivation: I want to run for mayor of the town

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the Tavern doorman and ask him how he is

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink wine and observe the people in the tavern

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go a table full of people and introduce yourself.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go to another table and try to get to know more people.
